subject: An idea for RJ Experiment #3
author: trilobitegal
full_text: RJ, if you live in or near a large city, like Denver, how about writing a number in chalk on a public building where it won't be noticed right away, and can be erased easily after the contest?  That way, any spirits could locate the building, post, bridge, or whatever, and see if they can see the chalk number or other symbol?  This might make it easier than trying to locate your home, with only an internet nickname to go by.  Just a thought.
